div.p: Group 1 Mapping from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/TriggerDefinition|5.0.0 to unspecified code system

tr.td: FHIR R5 ComplexType `TriggerDefinition` is representable via FHIR R4B extensions. Element `TriggerDefinition` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `TriggerDefinition`.
FHIR R5 ComplexType `TriggerDefinition` is representable via FHIR DSTU2 extensions. Element `TriggerDefinition` is not mapped to FHIR DSTU2, since FHIR R5 `TriggerDefinition` is not mapped.
Element `TriggerDefinition.type` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `TriggerDefinition.type`.
Element `TriggerDefinition.type` is not mapped to FHIR DSTU2, since FHIR R5 `TriggerDefinition` is not mapped.
Element `TriggerDefinition.name` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `TriggerDefinition.name`.
Element `TriggerDefinition.name` is mapped to FHIR STU3 element `TriggerDefinition.eventName`.
Element `TriggerDefinition.name` is not mapped to FHIR DSTU2, since FHIR R5 `TriggerDefinition` is not mapped.
Element `TriggerDefinition.code` is mapped to FHIR R4B structure `TriggerDefinition`, but has no target element specified.
Element `TriggerDefinition.code` is not mapped to FHIR DSTU2, since FHIR R5 `TriggerDefinition` is not mapped.
Element `TriggerDefinition.subscriptionTopic` is mapped to FHIR R4B structure `TriggerDefinition`, but has no target element specified.
Element `TriggerDefinition.subscriptionTopic` is not mapped to FHIR DSTU2, since FHIR R5 `TriggerDefinition` is not mapped.

Note that the target element context `TriggerDefinition.timing[x]` is a choice-type element and cannot directly hold extensions. The context is moved up to parent element `TriggerDefinition`. Element `TriggerDefinition.timing[x]` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `TriggerDefinition.timing[x]`. Note that the target element context `TriggerDefinition.timing[x]` is a choice-type element and cannot directly hold extensions. The context is moved up to parent element `TriggerDefinition`.

Note that the target element context `TriggerDefinition.eventTiming[x]` is a choice-type element and cannot directly hold extensions. The context is moved up to parent element `TriggerDefinition`. Element `TriggerDefinition.timing[x]` is mapped to FHIR STU3 element `TriggerDefinition.eventTiming[x]`. Note that the target element context `TriggerDefinition.eventTiming[x]` is a choice-type element and cannot directly hold extensions. The context is moved up to parent element `TriggerDefinition`.
Element `TriggerDefinition.timing[x]` is not mapped to FHIR DSTU2, since FHIR R5 `TriggerDefinition` is not mapped.
Element `TriggerDefinition.data` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `TriggerDefinition.data`.
Element `TriggerDefinition.data` is mapped to FHIR STU3 element `TriggerDefinition.eventData`.
Element `TriggerDefinition.data` is not mapped to FHIR DSTU2, since FHIR R5 `TriggerDefinition` is not mapped.
Element `TriggerDefinition.condition` is mapped to FHIR R4B element `TriggerDefinition.condition`.
Element `TriggerDefinition.condition` is mapped to FHIR STU3 structure `TriggerDefinition`, but has no target element specified.
Element `TriggerDefinition.condition` is not mapped to FHIR DSTU2, since FHIR R5 `TriggerDefinition` is not mapped.

title.value: Cross-version ConceptMap for FHIR R5 resources in FHIR R4

description.value: This ConceptMap represents the cross-version mapping of resource FHIR R5 for use in FHIR R4.
